QAPair.Question: What is (are) Genital herpes - self-care ?
QAPair.Answer: It is normal to be worried after finding out that you have genital herpes . But know that you are not alone. Millions of people carry the virus. Although there is no cure, genital herpes can be treated. Follow your health care provider's instructions for treatment and follow-up.
